messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Considering Unschooling for my Edison Trait son
messages.msgSnippet: Hello Lisa! Can unschooling realistically be done in a small, rural Midwestern community?  YES!  We do!  And we are quite small, rural and Midwestern!  We do
messages.messageBody:
Hello Lisa!

Can unschooling realistically be done in a small, rural Midwestern
community? YES! We do! And we are quite small, rural and Midwestern! We
do different things here than we would do in the city, but there are lots of
opportunities. Check out 4-H!

Dia

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Considering Unschooling for my Edison Trait son
Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Considering Unschooling for my Edison Trait son
messages.msgSnippet: Julie, Thanks for the welcome! Where in MO did you grow up? We live in Iowa. I think we re rivals. ;) Lisa :)
messages.messageBody:
Julie,

Thanks for the welcome! Where in MO did you grow up?
We live in Iowa. I think we're rivals. ;)

Lisa :)

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Considering Unschooling for my Edison Trait son
messages.msgSnippet: Lisa, I grew up in Missouri, but now I live in Flordia.  I am certain it can be done without you going insane.  These wonderful ladies on this list will help.
messages.messageBody:
Lisa,
I grew up in Missouri, but now I live in Flordia. I am certain it can be
done without you going insane. These wonderful ladies on this list will
help. Anyway, welcome.

Happy Mothering,
Julie
Mommy to Ali and Matthew, Wife to a Great Man, Adam
Please check out a few of my favorite sites:
http://www.mothering.com
http://www.AttachmentParenting.org
http://www.LaLecheLeague.org
http://www.naturalchild.org
"It helps me to remember that people are more important than ideas and that
being kind is more important than being right."
-Peggy O'Mara, Publisher of Mothering Magazine.

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Considering Unschooling for my Edison Trait son
messages.msgSnippet: Karen, We live in the hub of western Iowa (that s what the sign says anyway!)--Carroll, pop. ~10,000. I can see a cornfield from my home office window. Lisa
messages.messageBody:
Karen,

We live in "the hub of western Iowa" (that's what the
sign says anyway!)--Carroll, pop. ~10,000. I can see a
cornfield from my home office window.

Lisa :)

messages.msgSnippet: Hi Lisa, where in the Mid West are you?  I am in Evansville, Ind  ;  And yes it can be done!  :)  ~Karen

it can be done! :) ~Karen
